attributes.action: Remember there are places North of London
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why is everything always geared for London? Olympics London (the PM didn't champion Manchester)millennium dome (London) Now wanting the World Cup (London) Why doesn't he champion events to come to the North of London New houses affordable houses, down south why not up north? Is it a cynical ploy to try and get southern votes ?
